description: Manages a Log Analytics (formally Operational Insights) Solution.

Product.description: The product name of the solution. For example `OMSGallery/Containers`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

PromotionCode.description: A promotion code to be used with the solution.

Publisher.description: The publisher of the solution. For example `Microsoft`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group in which the Log Analytics solution is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Note: The solution and it's related workspace can only exist in the same resource group.

SolutionName.description: Specifies the name of the solution to be deployed. See [here for options](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/log-analytics/log-analytics-add-solutions).Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

WorkspaceName.description: The full name of the Log Analytics workspace with which the solution will be linked. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

WorkspaceResourceId.description: The full resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace with which the solution will be linked. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
